Benjamin Strickland

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Jesse and Sarra A. Gidley
  3. Location of Family: Morese Bluff, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Wahoo, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 9
  7. Date of Birth: 1888-11, NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: 1900 United States Federal Census; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories Vol. 2 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 75-81
